Text: Ok, I gotta give you credit. You nick is gollum, and at the end of your description of what is clearly a gruesome viewing experience, except for necrophiliacs, I'm would think, you say "Enjoy." Awesome, really. :)

I saw this when it was broadcast in the UK in 2007, and found it a gripping drama, with a great mixture of archive footage added in. I'd hardly call it some suitable for necrophiliacs, but something fascinating for those with an interest in history. From that perspective I did "enjoy" it.
